options.when_to_use: fullPage image has large blank regions
options.summary: Capture viewport screenshots while scrolling and stitch by y-offset

options.when_to_use: lazy assets or post-load animations are incomplete
options.summary: Wait for network idle, then extra warm-up delay before screenshot

options.when_to_use: visual capture is unstable but structure is needed
options.summary: Use accessibility/DOM snapshots as source of truth for section extraction
